item.title: HOW I CAN PUT NPCs in my server?And Attack it
item.dc:creator: @pat pat
item.description:
@pat wrote:

ok well you need to go into autospawn.cfg open it with notepad
you will have this at the top
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

the npc id is the npc id of the monster that you want
coordx is the coordinate of where u want to have ur monster… coord y is the same thing but for y
height= mostly there 0 but when ur in game tyep ::mypos and ull find out the coords and the heigth

range x1 is how far east you want it walk(i think im not sure) rangexy is how far south rangex2 is how far north and rangey2 is how far west…you can also make ur npcs not move to do that all you have to do is make rangex1 to ur coordx and ur rangey1 to coordy and rangex2 coordx and rangey2 is coordY i

find its alot more simple to do it there not walking

Read full topic
